articles.title: South Africa Star Heinrich Klaasen Announces Shock Retirement From Tests - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Heinrich Klaasen made his Test debut in India and went on to represent the country in Australia and twice played against the West Indies last summer.
articles.content: Proteas wicketkeeper batter Heinrich Klaasen has today announced his retirement from Test cricket. The 32-year-old steps away from the red-ball format after featuring in four matches for South Africa… [+1466 chars]
